text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump How is Obama saying Trump 'bungled the coronavirus response,' which implies the president was responsible for 90,000 deaths, any different that Trump saying there should be an investigation as to how a murdered girl's body wound up in Joe Scarborough's office?
